resources.string:
Introduce of Emotion Diary 

 The more you pay attention to yourself, the more effective it is to find ways to control your emotions.
 In order to control your emotions, you must know your feelings first.
 The first step is to know what you are feeling and why you are feeling this way. 
 It's frightening and embarrassing when you don't know what you're feeling,
 but knowing what you're feeling gives you control and confidence to handle it.

Introduce of Observation Journal 

 Here are some practical guidelines for setting your life goals.
 Writing an observation journal is a journey into your life through questions that look back on your own life and inside.
 It helps to find self-confidence, vision, 
and clarity by having a conversation time with yourself and reflecting on yourself.
 This journal will remain
 the most helpful book
 for self-development than any other book.

Introduce of Bliss Plan 

 Bliss means what you feel meaningful.
 Follow your bliss. 
 Make your life meaningful with EMS's Bliss Plan.

string-array.name: launchText
string-array.item: "If you can concentrate always on the present, you\'ll be a happy man." - Paulo Cuelho
"Men are wise in proportion, not to their experience, but to their capacity for experience." - James Boswell
"True life is lived when tiny changes occur." - Leo Tolstoy
